name: Carnage (itch) (Sephez, Nimeth)
description:
Project made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. Race your way to glory!
We had a lot of fun on our first game jam, but unfortunately we ran out of time and couldn't realize all of our ideas, however we're both very excited to keep working on this project even after the game jam!

For maximum enjoyment, don't let go of the boost button!

Keyboard controls:
Q and E to rotate, SHIFT to boost and LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to shoot.

Programmer
Miguel Redondo
https://nimeth.itch.io/

Artist
Mauricio Redondo
https://sephez.itch.io/

Sound Effects and Music from https://www.zapsplat.com
